name: Deber
description:
Deber is a short platform game where you play as Deber, a minor demon.
Your Lord has lost the precious flame that gives him his fabulous powers after a night of demon drinking and a bad bet.
To recover the fragments of his flame, he will send you on missions across different worlds.
Along the way you will acquire new skills and use them wisely to reach some hidden places.
Journey through 4 fantastic 3D levels, most of the assets and animations are self made.
Enjoy each level with its own visual design and sound.
Checkpoints are there to give you a break.

Gameplay

All inputs are configurable with keyboards in options.
In the game, press "esc" to go through the options tab.
